column1:
share on x pa patti. jun 12 at 10:17 am dear cousins, we are so sorry to hear of your moms (bertha g. napolitano brennan) passing. our prayers and thoughts will be with you robert and family at this sad time in your life. i know she will surly be missed. i had the pleasure of speaking with her about the family members back in 2009. we are from the family of bertha's mom (anna) brother gabriel rinaldi / ranalli . god bless and we love you all. your cousin's, rich and patti kirkland. niagara falls, nycomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe scott & barbieri family funeral homes website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
